name: Get User Insights
description: This API allows you to query your LoginRadius Cloud Directory.

Get Params.name: apisecret
Get Params.description: LoginRadius API secret or LoginRadius API Secondary secret with Analytics API permission enabled

Post Params.name: from
Post Params.description: The start date for the records you would like to retrieve yyyy-mm-dd

Post Params.name: to
Post Params.description: The end data for the records you would like to retrive yyyy-mm-dd

Post Params.name: q
Post Params.description: The query that you would like to pull data on details on query format can be found here
